title: CPLLM: Clinical prediction with large language models
details: O Ben Shoham, N Rappoport - PLOS Digital Health, 2024
abstract: We present Clinical Prediction with Large Language Models (CPLLM), a method that involves fine-tuning a pre-trained Large Language Model (LLM) for predicting clinical disease and readmission. We utilized quantization and fine-tuned the LLM using …
